title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Language Learning Instructional Design Using Mobile Social Media

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more learner engagement strategies using mobile social media platforms (e.g., Instagram, TikTok).
Learners can develop five or more types of multimedia materials for language learning using social media-based content creation tools.
Learners build and share a formative assessment system utilizing digital feedback with peer teachers.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
